about_the_game:
Always remember your adventure to The Forgotten City with these two real-world keepsakes:

1. A gorgeous hand-painted map of the city by Artist and Cartographer Francesca Baerald, ready to print.



Specs: Color, A3


2. An intricately detailed statue of Magistrate Sentius, in classic ancient Roman style, ready to 3D print.
Comes with a separate STL file for a plinth to support the main statue.



Specs: Compatible with FDM and Resin printers. Default size: 28.9cm. Includes Printing Guide
If you don't have a 3D printer, you can have it printed and delivered by a 3D printing service.
detailed_description:
Always remember your adventure to The Forgotten City with these two real-world keepsakes:

1. A gorgeous hand-painted map of the city by Artist and Cartographer Francesca Baerald, ready to print.



Specs: Color, A3


2. An intricately detailed statue of Magistrate Sentius, in classic ancient Roman style, ready to 3D print.
Comes with a separate STL file for a plinth to support the main statue.



Specs: Compatible with FDM and Resin printers. Default size: 28.9cm. Includes Printing Guide
If you don't have a 3D printer, you can have it printed and delivered by a 3D printing service.
